parameters.definition: Fat content per slice of pizza
Ratio of the number of pizza slices to the number of burgers

description: A doctor recommends that a man eat burgers and pizza in order to put on weight. Each burger contains \param{FatPerBurger} units of fat and \param{CaloriesPerBurger} calories. Each slice of pizza contains \param{FatPerPizzaSlice} units of fat and \param{CaloriesPerPizzaSlice} calories. The man must get at least \param{MinFat} units of fat and \param{MinCalories} calories. Further, each burger contains \param{CholesterolPerBurger} units of cholesterol while each slice of pizza contains \param{CholesterolPerPizzaSlice} units of cholesterol. Since burgers are slightly more expensive, the man decides to eat at least \param{PizzaBurgerRatio} times as many slices of pizza as burgers. How many of each should he eat to minimize his cholesterol intake?
